overview_of_class: Development of message strategies for communicating with consumers and other audiences. Emphasis on understanding audiences, how persuasion works and how brand communications are developed and executed. Hands-on exercises in writing creative briefs and using digital and social media for effective communications. Prerequisites: for non-Medill students: IMC 303 and admission to the IMC Certificate Program; for Medill students: JOUR 301.
name: Message Strategy and Persuasive Communications
title: JOUR IMC 305-0-20 Message Strategy and Persuasive Communications
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Registration is reserved for students who have completed IMC 303-0 or JOUR 301-0
